items.summary: Add 'First Name' and 'Last Name' input fields to the order form in OrderForm.tsx, positioned immediately before the shipping address fields. Both fields should be required and their values should be included in the order submission payload.

Remove the Internet Identity login/logout button from the Header component (frontend/src/components/marketing/Header.tsx) so that the sticky header contains only the logo and navigation links, with no authentication controls visible.

Add the contact email address 'all4funflorida@gmail.com' to the very bottom of the website in the Footer component (frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer.tsx), presented as a clickable mailto link with a label such as 'Questions? Email us at all4funflorida@gmail.com'.
